SEARCH

Package SnakeGame

package SnakeGame
  • Class
    Description
    AISnakeController
    Responsible for controlling the snake automatically
    Direction
    Represents a direction in the snake game, being only possible the 4 cardinal directions
    Direction.TurnDirection
    Represents a turning direction, being only possible to turn left, right or not turn
    DynamicObstacle
    Represents an obstacle that is rotating in a periodic motion
    FoodCircle
    Represents a food item that is a circle.
    FoodSquare
    Represents a food item that is a square.
    FoodStats
    A class containing the required information to be able to get the snake's properties on command
    GameManager
    Class responsible for managing the game, being also the one that initializes it.
    GameManager.ControlMethod
    The snake's control method setting.
    GameManager.FoodType
    The type of food to spawn.
    GameManagerBuilder
    Builder for GameManager
    GameMap
    Represents the game map, where the game will take place and the GameObjects will be in.
    GameoverOverlay
    The overlay displayed when the current game terminates.
    GameplayOverlay
    The overlay displayed while the game is being played
    HighscoresOverlay
    The overlay to display the highscores
    IFood
    Represents a food object.
    IFoodStats
    An interface to get a food's properties
    IHighscoresReader
    An object that will retrieve the game's highscores
    InputSnakeController
    Responsible for turning the snake via input
    InputSnakeController.InputPreset
    Represents a set of inputs that translate to snake movement
    IObstacle
    Represents an obstacle the snake might collide with.
    ISnakeController
    Represents a class that will give where the snake should turn next
    ISnakeStats
    An interface to get a snake's properties
    ISpatialComponent
    Represents an object that has a position
    Score
    Represents a score entry Can be sorted by score
    Scoreboard
    This class represents all of the scores set.
    Snake
    Represents the snake the snake has a series of SnakeUnits as it's body.
    SnakeController
    Responsible for controlling a snake (using a controller)
    SnakeGameException
    Represents an exception within the snake game.
    SnakeStats
    A class containing the required information to be able to get the snake's properties on command
    SnakeUnit
    Represents a unit of a snake
    StaticObstacle
    Represents an immovable obstacle the snake should avoid
    Unit
    Represents a unit: A square that holds a position, can be moved and can be rendered.
